welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Pasadena Hills! Known for its beautiful architecture and lush greenery, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. From scenic hikes to delicious local cuisine, we hope you have a memorable stay here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zephyrhills Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Zephyrhills Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A at Tampa International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C at Tampa International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside E
terminals.description: Airside E at Tampa International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
